sourcesContent:
import ProtectedRoute from 'Helpers/ProtectedRoute'
import React from 'react'
import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'
import { BrowserRouter, Route, Switch, Redirect } from 'react-router-dom'
import { Home, Login, Header, Post, Posts, Signup } from './Pages'

const App = () => {
  const isAuth = useSelector(state => state.auth.auth.isAuth)

  return (
    <BrowserRouter>
      <Header />
      <Switch>
        {/* <Route path='/' component={Home} exact />
        {!auth.isAuth && (
          <>
            <Route path='/signup' component={Signup} />
            <Route path='/login' component={Login} />
          </>
        )}
        {auth.isAuth && (
          <>
            <Route path='/posts' component={Posts} />
            <Route path='/post/:id' component={Post} />
          </>
        )} */}
        <ProtectedRoute exact path='/posts' component={Home} isAuth={isAuth} />
        <ProtectedRoute exact path='/posts' component={Posts} isAuth={isAuth} />
        <ProtectedRoute exact path='/post/:id' component={Post} isAuth={isAuth} />
        <Route exact path='/signup'>
          {isAuth ? <Redirect to='/' /> : <Signup />}
        </Route>
        <Route exact path='/login'>
          {isAuth ? <Redirect to='/' /> : <Login />}
        </Route>
      </Switch>
    </BrowserRouter>
  )
}

export default App
